titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 25th Anniversary of the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency.
A resolution recognizing the 25th Anniversary of the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the women and men of the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency on the agency's 25th anniversary. It also honors the agency's professionals, past and present, for their selfless service and dedication to the United States.
